title: PM Shehbaz strongly condemns terror attacks in DI Khan, Bannu districts
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 25 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday strongly condemned the terrorist attacks took place in Dera Ismail Khan and Bannu districts which claimed the lives of security personnel.
The prime minister paid tribute to the Frontier Constabulary personnel who embraced martyrdom while bravely fighting terrorists in the Drazanda area of DI Khan.
Prime Minister Shehbaz also expressed condolence over the martyrsom of two police officials in another terrorist attack in Bannu district.
He prayed to Allah Almighty for elevation of the martyrs’ ranks in paradise and conveyed his condolence to the bereaved families.
“The entire nation salutes its martyrs. We are resolved to root out the terrorism from the country,” he remarked.
